page.title: 16Cotswold Promotion Line Pt.2
page.content: The group distributer promotional litarture and organises meetings both public and British Rail.The groups acheivements include: 1.The retention of two weekday Inter-City through trains two and from London,after B.R.had annnounced its intention to withdraw all such trains as from May 1982. 2.The gradual upgrading of the track enabling faster train serices(including the introduction in 1984 of the Cotswould and Malvern Express,High Speed Train)to operate, has been achieved after pressure from the Group. 3.Better connecting services at Worcester. 4.Re-opening in May 1981 of Honeybourne station. 5.Increase in the number of trains serving Pershore.
